title: ASP.NET MVC access to Facebook and Twitter
ques:
When building an ASP.NET MVC app that interfaces with Facebook and Twitter, what are the best and most popular libraries out there making it easy for us .NET developers?

Thanks.

answers.ans:
For Facebook, the Facebook C# SDK seems pretty active and stable: http://facebooksdk.codeplex.com/
Regarding Twitter, take a look at TweetSharp http://tweetsharp.codeplex.com/

When it comes to Twitter I've heard it is very simple to use their APIs directly, might be an option for you as well.



Good Luck!
